page.title: 04Housing in Bristol
page.content:
In Bristol there are some new town houses, which are near to the {Docks} and if you looked out of the windows of them, you would probably have a very nice view. So, of course, they are very expensive. They are built of red brick and have central heating. The room are very small. Gardens are what everybody looks for, so they have gardens as well as garages. No pollution with these houses - they have not got any chimneys.
There are also a lot of flats in Bristol. Some of them have balconies. In the flats they have 2 or 3 bedrooms, a kitchen, a bathroom with a bath and toilet in it and a living room. If you are on the top floor you sometimes have an attic.
